name: Cryoderm Cold Roll-On 95 ml
descr:
Available in GEL, ROLL-ON & SPRAY.

CRYODERM® Cryotherapy products provide fast acting, deep penetrating, pain relieving cold therapy for muscle sprains and ligament strains, sore stiff muscles, bursitis and tendonitis, arthritis and joint pain. The secret of this pain reliever is itâ€™s deep penetrating, long lasting Cold Sensation.

Contains Natural Plant Extract
ARNICA: (Reduces bruising and inflammation)
BOSWELLA: A Natural COX-2 Enzyme Inhibitor (Reduces inflammation and has anti- arthritic actions)
EUCALYPTUS: (Pain reliever and natural anti-bacterial)
ILEX: (Reduces muscle spasm and inflammation)
MENTHOL: (Anti-inflammatory, Pain reliever)
MSM: A Naturally occurring nutrient (Increases membrane penetration, Anti-inflammatory and local analgesia.)
PEPPERMINT OIL: (Anesthetic, vascular and lymphatic system stimulant, creates a temporary burning cold sensation eliciting the Gate Theory of Pain Control) Denatured Grain
Alcohol: For external use only. The Dye free Water based Liquid GEL never balls up and applies like a lotion, allowing the provider to perform Myofascial Release, Soft Tissue and Trigger Point Therapy during application.

With 3 X the active Ingredients of other Gels, practitioners and patients are sure to get Maximum Pain Relief!
